review: Enjoyed it. As a Bhartiya, the story of Ramayana is memorized since our childhood. But the effort put by animators is praise worthy. Hats off to artists and director of this movie. Thoroughly enjoyable compared to real humanly acted movie. Thanks Chetan Desai and whole team. Especially Juhy Chawla was perfect in voice over for Sitamata. Jay shri Ram !!!
The best animated movie ever made in India.Animations and graphics was ahead of the time when it was released.A must watch.
Great movie...loved the dialogues,the fight ing actions and the story presentation, was above it all..a perfect treat to watch for youngsters
excellent movie to watch , it has used good animation  graphics that aren't frequently seen in Indian animation movies

When I was in nursery then this released
A good movie but only for children
Ramayana is excellent in the animated film
It's ultimate when it comes to animated screening
